languages.text: "Ваша Светлость... Вы оказали мне великую честь, позволив служить вам..." {n}Голос Вицента заметно дрожит, но он все же твердо стоит на ногах.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость... Вы оказали мне великую честь, позволив служить вам..." {n}Голос Вицента заметно дрожит, но сам он сохраняет обладание и твердо стоит на ногах.{/n}
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: " Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... You have done me a great honour by allowing me to serve you..." {n}Vicent's voice is noticeably quivering but his bearing his upright and unwavering.{/n}

languages.text: 「陛下…お仕えできて、大変光栄でした…」{n}ヴィセントの声は明らかに震えているが、その姿勢はまっすぐで揺るぎがない。{/n}
languages.original_text: " Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... You have done me a great honour by allowing me to serve you..." {n}Vicent's voice is noticeably quivering but his bearing his upright and unwavering.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「陛下…お仕えできて、大変光栄でした…」{n}ヴィセントの声は明らかに震えているが、その姿勢はまっすぐで揺るぎがない。{/n}
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: “大人……我十分荣幸曾为您效劳……”{n}文森特声音发颤，但身形依旧坚定不移。{/n}
languages.original_text: " Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... You have done me a great honour by allowing me to serve you..." {n}Vicent's voice is noticeably quivering but his bearing his upright and unwavering.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “大人……我十分荣幸曾为您效劳……”{n}文森特声音发颤，但身形依旧坚定。{/n}
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie... Vous servir a été pour moi un grand honneur, » {n}déclare Vicent la voix tremblante, mais ferme sur ses jambes.{/n}
languages.original_text: " Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... You have done me a great honour by allowing me to serve you..." {n}Vicent's voice is noticeably quivering but his bearing his upright and unwavering.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie... Vous servir a été pour moi un grand honneur, » {n}déclare Vicent la voix tremblante, mais ferme sur ses jambes.{/n}
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}... Me ha concedido el honor de {mf|servirle|servirla}». {n}A Vicent le tiembla la voz, pero su postura se mantiene firme.{/n}
languages.original_text: " Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... You have done me a great honour by allowing me to serve you..." {n}Vicent's voice is noticeably quivering but his bearing his upright and unwavering.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}... Me ha concedido el honor de {mf|servirle|servirla}». {n}A Vicent le tiembla la voz, pero se mantiene firme.{/n}
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Ihr habt mir eine große Ehre erwiesen, indem Ihr mir gestattet, Euch zu dienen ..." {n}Vicents Stimme zittert merklich, er steht jedoch weiterhin aufrecht und fest.{/n}
languages.original_text: " Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... You have done me a great honour by allowing me to serve you..." {n}Vicent's voice is noticeably quivering but his bearing his upright and unwavering.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Ihr habt mir eine große Ehre erwiesen, indem Ihr mir gestattet, Euch zu dienen ..." {n}Seine Stimme zittert merklich, er ist aber noch fest auf den Füßen.{/n}
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri... Şahsınıza hizmet edebilme onurunu bana bağışladığınız için müteşekkirim..." {n}Sesi bariz şekilde titrese de Vicent, dik ve yılmaz bir duruş sergiliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: " Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... You have done me a great honour by allowing me to serve you..." {n}Vicent's voice is noticeably quivering but his bearing his upright and unwavering.{/n}

traits.speaker: YoungGaprak
